EmailTemplate.name: IS November 2011 Price Announcement
EmailTemplate.subject: November 2011 Price Announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DUPONT(R) DuPont Protection Technologies
November 11, 2011
Dear {!Contact.Id} ,
Effective January 1, 2012, the following prices will go into effect for NOMEX® continuous filament yarns for Aerospace and Industrial end uses:
Denier Decitex Type Price($/lb) Effective Date End Use/ Market 200 den 220 dtex 430 (natural) $100.00 Jan 1, 2012 Aerospace / Industrial 1200 den 1335 dtex 430 (natural) $48.00 Jan 1, 2012 Aerospace / Industrial 1200 den 1335 dtex N101 (camo) $55.00 Jan 1, 2012 Aerospace / Industrial 1600 den 1780 dtex 430 (natural) $42.00 Jan 1, 2012 Aerospace / Industrial
These prices reflect continued strong demand for NOMEX®. Although we have implemented a discontinuation of N101 220dtex colored NOMEX® filament, we have no plans to discontinue production of the products listed above now or in the foreseeable future.
Also effective January 1, 2012, or as contracts and agreements permit, DuPont Protection Technologies is announcing a price increase for some DuPont™ Nomex® products in other segments.
The price increase is for shipments of Nomex® products sold into the Thermal Industrial, Emergency Response, and Military Thermal segments in North America. The following prices will be effective January 1, 2012:
Denier Decitx Type Price ($/lb) Effective Date End Use / Market 200 den 220 dtex 430 (natural) $50.29 Jan 1, 2012 Thermal Industrial/ Military Thermal (garments)
These increases will help support continued investment in productivity, material science, product development and our brands to help meet the needs and expectations of our customers and those who use these products in their daily lives.
Please be assured that DuPont Protection Technologies values our relationship with you and appreciates your continued use of DuPont products in the solutions you provide to help protect people.
Please let me know if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
Patricia Humble Account Manager DuPont Protection Technologies Phone: 800.503.4915 or 804.383.4915 Email: Patricia.G.Humble@usa.dupont.com
